item.title: Managing iptables as a Service and Integrating with Docker
item.description: Reference: https://upcloud.com/resources/tutorials/configure-iptables-centos Problem: Non-persistent iptables rule after system restarts. This is how to add a rule to iptables: sudo iptables -A INPUT -p tcp --dport ssh -j ACCEPT Solution: This command applies the rule immediately, but it won’t persist after a system restart.

item.title: Summary of Setting up Firewall on Different Distros
item.description: In this article, I will cover the basics of setting up firewalls on different distros, including firewalld, ufw, and iptables. We will also discuss the daily tasks of firewall management, such as allowing or blocking specific source addresses/destination ports, port forwarding, and NAT.
